title: Update marathon link and fix prizes loading issue

acceptanceCriteria: DeploymentInfo component displays 'Jhajha Marathon' link instead of generic deployment URL
QR code generates correctly for the Jhajha Marathon URL

requirements.text: Debug and fix the prizes display functionality so that the 'View Prizes' section loads correctly and shows all prize categories and amounts

quotes: view prizes is not loading kindly update it

acceptanceCriteria: All prize data fetches successfully from backend
Prize cards display with correct amounts (₹5000/₹3000/₹1000)
Loading states and error handling work properly

constraints: Preserve existing prize structure in backend (overall category with ₹5000/₹3000/₹1000)
Maintain current authentication flow with Internet Identity
